title: Restaurant Operations Intelligence
summary: An integrated AI platform designed specifically for restaurant chains with 5+ locations — featuring automated inspections, staff training systems, and intelligent inventory management.

title: Professional Development Suite
summary: An intelligent career development platform that guides professionals through resume optimization, skill assessment, and career pathway planning using AI-driven insights.

title: Healthcare Modernization
summary: A streamlined platform for healthcare practices and medical offices that streamlines patient intake, optimizes scheduling, and automates follow-ups — improving care without disrupting existing systems.
